meanings.definition: The triangular part of a wall between the edges of a sloping roof.
meanings.sent1: The gable of the house was painted a bright red color.
meanings.sent2: The architect added intricate details to the gable of the building.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel climbed up the gable and peeked over the edge.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared high like a gable reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The gable stood tall and proud against the backdrop of the setting sun.

meanings.definition: A decorative triangular piece at the top of a wall or building.
meanings.sent1: The ornate gable on the cathedral was a masterpiece of craftsmanship.
meanings.sent2: The gable of the old mansion was adorned with intricate carvings.
meanings.sent3: The birds perched on the gable, chirping a melodious tune.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and welcoming as a gable on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The gable gleamed in the sunlight, catching the eye of all who passed by.
